content: विभु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (भू-भ्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Mighty, powerful. {@--2@} Eminent, supreme. {@--3@} Able to, capable of (with <ab>inf.</ab>); (धनुः) पूरयितुं भवंति विभवः शिखरमणिउचः <ls>Ki. 5. 43.</ls> {@--4@} Self-subdued, firm, self-controlled; कमपरमवशं न विप्रकुर्यर्विभुमपि तं यदमी स्पृशति भावाः <ls>Ku. 6. 95.</ls> {@--5@} (In Nyāya <ab>phil.</ab>) Eternal, existing everywhere, allpervading, pervading all material things; सर्वमूर्तद्रव्यसंयोगित्वं विभुत्वम्. {@--6@} Firm, hard. --भुः {@--1@} Ether. {@--2@} Space. {@--3@} Time. {@--4@} The soul. {@--5@} A lord, ruler, master, sovereign, king. {@--6@} The supreme ruler; <ls>Bg. 5. 15</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">10. 12.</ls> {@--7@} A servant. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of Brahman. {@--9@} Of Śiva; <ls>Ku. 6. 95</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 31</ls>; <ls>Mu. 1. 1.</ls> {@--10@} Of Viṣṇu.

विभू {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To appear, become manifest. {@--2@} To be equal to, suffice for. {@--3@} To pervade. {@--4@} To be able, be capable of, prevail. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To think of, reflect, contemplate. {@--2@} To be aware of, know, perceive, discover, see; <ls>Māl. 1. 18</ls>; <ls n="Māl.">5. 21</ls>; <ls>Pt. 5. 7</ls>; <ls>U. 2. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To see or observe minutely, perceive carefully; <ls>V. 4.</ls> {@--4@} To decide, settle, make clear. {@--5@} To manifest, show, reveal. {@--6@} To separate. {@--7@} To suppose, imagine. {@--8@} To convince. {@--9@} To establish, prove; <ls>Ś. 6. 10.</ls>
